name: magnetization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being magnetic: They read the data by detecting the magnetisation of the material. Evidence of past magnetization is contained in individual rock samples.
More examplesFewer examplesIn these cases, the magnetisation is proportional to the external field.This technique provides unique capabilities for the visualization of magnetization patterns.A study of rock samples from the right and left of the cavity has shown that its magnetization switches round at regular intervals.
